cheerleader.translation[0].definitions[0: a member of a team of young women who encourage a crowd to cheer at a US sports game by shouting special words and dancing
She was a popular cheerleader at the University of Texas.
cheerleader.translation[0].definitions[1: someone who encourages other people to do something
She was our cheerleader, teacher, and friend.
cheerleader.translation[1].definitions[0: someone who supports an idea, plan etc and tries to persuade other people to support it
He was one of the biggest cheerleaders of economic globalization.
